content: materials - main color mc 1 skein of purl soho s buttercup cotton 1 100% organically grown cotton each skein is 364 yards approximately 272 yards required for either the bag or backpack - contrast color 1 skein of buttercup cotton approximately 16 yards required for the bag or 62 yards for the backpack - us 1 5 2 75 mm 16-inch circular needles 3 - spare 16-inch circular needles us 1 5 2 75 mm or smaller - a set of us 1 5 2 75 mm double pointed needles 4 - a stitch marker 5 - stitch holders 6 or scrap yarn - a few yards of fingering weight scrap yarn - a size b e 2 5 3 5 mm crochet hook 7 for provisional cast on we made our samples in the following colors… bag sample main color is woodland gray contrast color is summer melon backpack sample main color is heirloom white contrast color is jonquil yellow gauge 28 stitches and 40 rounds = 4 inches in stockinette stitch size - finished circumference 18 inches - finished height 12 inches - length of straps backpack only 31½ inches notes construction you begin both the bag and backpack by making i-cords for the drawstrings you then knit the body of the sack from top down and in the round incorporating a hem that encases the i-cords and finishing with slightly different instructions for the bag or backpack provisional cast-on for assistance including how to put live stitches back onto needles please visit our provisional cast-on a two-step method tutorial 8 designed by purl soho designer jake canton 9 click here 10 to see even more of jake s designs 1 https //www purlsoho com/buttercup-cotton html 2 https //www purlsoho com/yarn html yarn_stitches_per_inch_filter=968 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23799 5 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=964 6 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23859 7 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23805 8 https //www purlsoho com/create/provisional-cast-on/ 9 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/jake-canton-for-purl-soho/ 10 http //www jakecanton com/
